title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: CLI & server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; pip install ollama gives synchronous & async access to local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embeddings with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI for Ollama written in Go; browse, pull and chat inside terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline coding copilots with autocomplete & chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local documents.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (Kotlin friendly) with sync & async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client for Ollama REST API published on npm.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly typed async client for Ollama; crates.io published.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama models with session memory.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU nodes and model pre-pull.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU setups plus examples with Open WebUI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust-client
summary: Lightweight Rust client published on crates.io; supports chat, generate and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-chatbot-react
summary: Example React app using ollama-js to build a ChatGPT-like interface with TailwindCSS.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on your vault notes using Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-redis
summary: Redis vector-search RAG example combining Ollama embeddings, Redis Stack and FastAPI.
